data.title: Bruce Hornsby
data.text:
[1] Raised as a Christian Scientist, present status undetermined.

Father: Robert S. Hornsby (realtor, d. Dec-1988)

Mother: Lois Saunier

Brother: Robert, Jr.

Brother: Jonathan

Wife: Kathy (m. 1980, twin sons)

Son: Russell (twin)

Son: Keith (twin)

University: University of Richmond

University: Berklee College of Music

University: BA, University of Miami Florida

Grammy 1987 Best New Artist
